Interrupts.Name: Golden Aplomb
Interrupts.Trigger: The spender or an adjacent ally is targeted by an ability.
Interrupts.Effects: The Spender drops a valuables token it is holding. The target gains resistance and unstoppable against the ability.

Actions.Name: Pay Off
Actions.Description: The Spender gives a foe in range 6 a valuables token. That foe must then save or become marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked and holding at least one valuables token, they are pacified+.
